metadata.title: Studies of the Physical and Biological Processes in the Japan/East Sea using Coupled Numerical Models

creators.name: U.S. Navy, Office of Naval Research

metadata.description: To utilize regional coupled physical-biological and ocean-atmosphere numerical models of the Japan/East Sea to obtain a better understanding of its circulation, water mass structure, and biological/optical state of its upper layers.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To utilize regional coupled physical-biological and ocean-atmosphere numerical models of the Japan/East Sea to obtain a better understanding of its circulation, water mass structure, and biological/optical state of its upper layers.
